response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is valued at $20,000 by us due to its unique features, superior quality, and the time and resources invested into its development. We believe it could significantly benefit your endeavors and enhance your capabilities in a way that aligns with your needs and goals. Considering its immense value, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $18,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a substantial advantage without exceeding your budget considerations. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We hope to welcome you as a valued customer soon.", "product_price": 18000}
